child.pub-comments: "The last fluent speakers died in 2004. There are about 20 semi-speakers with a passive command of the language" (Campbell & Grondona [in preparation]: 392).

child.pub-comments: "The term Catío is currently used for another language belonging to the Chocóan family" (Campbell & Grondona [in preparation]: 393).
